metadata.name: RED GLASSES-1
metadata.description:
The first painting from the Red glasses collection.

I look at the world and the suffering of its people with red blood glasses on my eyes.

The winged cat in this story keeps a contemporary and half-ruined city between stillness and ashes.

This paradox is the ability of man and the earth to survive in the presence or absence of world rulers.

Oil on canvas - Size: 140x90cm
